abstract: Vatican’s doctrinal office denounces American nun Sister Margaret A Farley for publishing book Just Love: A Framework for Christian Sexual Ethics, which attempts to present a theological rationale for same-sex relationships, masturbation and remarriage after divorce; it is second time since 2011 that a book written by an American nun has been censured by the church's hierarchy.
